The leaders and military advisors of both countries are actively engaging in diplomatic negotiations to reduce tensions and avoid catastrophic consequences. Steps include initiating diplomatic talks, evaluating feasibility, establishing communication hotlines, and focusing on peaceful resolutions. Both sides are prioritizing diplomatic efforts, engaging in discussions to address disputes, and coordinating with other world leaders to prevent accidental nuclear war. Establishing communication hotlines and synchronized responses are key components of their strategy to de-escalate the situation and maintain peace.

Steps include initiating diplomatic talks, evaluating feasibility, establishing communication hotlines, and focusing on peaceful resolutions. Both sides are prioritizing diplomatic efforts, engaging in discussions to address disputes, and coordinating with other world leaders to prevent accidental nuclear war. Establishing communication hotlines and synchronized responses are key components of their strategy to de-escalate the situation and maintain peace.
